message: I'll take 99% of the money, you can have the rest. It's a fair deal, considering you get something for nothing.
Let's be reasonable, Alice. I propose a 55/45 split in my favor.  It's a strong offer considering I'm willing to forgo taking the majority.
I'm willing to compromise. 60/40 split in my favor is a fair offer, considering the dwindling value of the money. Let's end this before things get worse.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. I'm proposing a 50/50 split to end this now.  Don't be greedy, we both lose if this goes on.
